short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A web extension that replaces English spelled place names with their Muscogee language equivalent

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is to modernize and transform the web for Muscogee speaking peoples. It replaces the location names of places all throughout the US with their Muscogee language alternative and written using the Muscogee alphabet.
